text: is there a function for in-place horizontal concatenation of DataFrames, or do I have to do it column by column?

elements.text: is there a function for in-place horizontal concatenation of DataFrames, or do I have to do it column by column?

text: `DataFrames.hcat!` but it is not part of a public API. If you feel it would be useful to have it can you please open an issue (there was one about it in the past but I cannot find it now)
